'''''Vinyar Tengwar 24''''' is the twenty-fourth issue of ''[[Vinyar Tengwar]]'', a journal dedicated to the scholarly study of the invented languages of  [[J.R.R. Tolkien]].
{{VTnav|23|25}}

==Contents==
* Cover: "''Dant Vaedhros garad Mîr in Geleidh''" — Tom Loback
* E.L.F. News

* "''[[Sauron Defeated]]'': A Linguistic Review"✫ — Carl F. Hostetter
* "'Verbs, Syntax! Hooray!': A Preliminary Assessment of Adunaic Grammar" — Patrick H. Wynne and Carl F. Hostetter

<small>✫ contains formerly unpublished material</small>
